faq1.question: How to start using quantitative trading?
faq1.answer: After registering an account, you can choose a trading strategy that suits you, set parameters, and start automated trading.

faq2.question: How to choose trading strategies?
faq2.answer: We offer various strategies including arbitrage, hedging, and high-frequency trading. You can choose the strategy that best fits your risk preference and investment goals.

faq3.question: How to view trading records?
faq3.answer: You can view detailed trading records in your personal center, including transaction time, amount, and returns.

faq4.question: How to contact customer support?
faq4.answer: You can contact us through online chat, email, or phone. Our support team is available 24/7 to assist you.
